footer.about: Founded by Wiam, Álvaro, and Izan. Your trusted transport and logistics operator. Located in the Constantí Industrial Park.
footer.copyright: © {year} Ivora Logistics SL. All rights reserved.

hero.title: Ivora: Excellence in transport and logistics.
hero.subtitle: Your trusted transport operator. Specialists in design and decoration products, with comprehensive logistics and storage solutions.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: We are proud of the trust our clients place in us.

about.title: Our Story, Your Solution
about.subtitle: Ivora was born from the shared vision of three founders, Wiam, Álvaro, and Izan, with the goal of redefining excellence in transport and logistics. We specialize in handling and transporting design and decoration products, offering a service that combines precision, care, and efficiency.
about.founded_by_experts_desc: Our company was founded with the passion and experience of Wiam, Álvaro, and Izan to offer a superior logistics service.
about.strategic_location_desc: Our offices and warehouse are located in the Constantí Industrial Park, a key point for efficient distribution.
about.our_vision_desc: We aim to be industry leaders by combining technological innovation, sustainable practices, and exceptional customer service.
about.cta_button: Discover how we can help you

consulting.title: Innovation, Sustainability, and Technology
consulting.subtitle: To remain leaders, we combine technological innovation, sustainability, and excellence. We adopt digitalization, AI, and automation to offer an efficient, safe, and environmentally friendly service.
benefits: Route optimization and inventory management with AI.
Automation and collaborative robotics in our warehouses.
Green logistics with electric vehicles and sustainable packaging.
Full transparency with blockchain technology for traceability.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have a question or need a custom logistics solution? Fill out the form.
contact.message_placeholder: Please describe your needs or question in detail...
contact.toast_success_description: Thanks for contacting us. We will get back to you soon.
contact.toast_error_description: Could not send the message. Please try again.

location.title: Where We Are
location.subtitle: Visit our offices and warehouse in the logistics heart of Tarragona.
location.address_details:
Carrer de la Logística, 123
Polígon Industrial de Constantí
43120 Constantí, Tarragona

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Our specialized selection in design and decoration for your home or business.
products.design_specialists_desc: Specialized transport and storage for design products, with the utmost care and precision.
products.home_decor_desc: We offer a curated selection of decoration products to transform any space.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer a complete suite of services to combine innovation, sustainability, and excellence.
services.international_transport_desc: Reliable and efficient international freight solutions, ensuring timely deliveries worldwide.
services.integral_logistics_desc: Complete management of your supply chain, from planning and origin to the final destination.
services.storage_distribution_desc: Secure storage services at our Constantí warehouse and strategic distribution to optimize your inventory.
services.custom_solutions_desc: We develop personalized logistics plans and premium services adapted to the unique challenges of your business.
